description: The hasty mass burial of animals infected with coronavirus was declared illegal.
title: Coronavirus: Calls in Denmark to dig up millions of dead mink
title_page: Coronavirus: Calls in Denmark to dig up millions of dead mink - BBC News
maintext: "We have two generations of really skilled mink farmers, father and son, who in a very, very short time have had their life's work shattered, and that¡­ It's been emotional for them. Sorry. For me as well," she said, wiping away tears.
